UDPRN.description: Royal Mail's Unique Delivery Point Reference Number.

UPRN.description: UPRN of the location. A Unique Property Reference Number (UPRN) is a unique numeric identifier for every addressable location in Great Britain.

buildingName.description: The building name is a description applied to a single building or a small group of buildings.

buildingNumber.description: The building number, or postal number, is a number given to a single building or a small group of buildings.

cityOrTown.description: City or town in which the address is located

county.description: County in which the address is located

dependentLocality.description: Dependent locality areas may define an area within a town or city.

doubleDependentLocality.description: To distinguish between similar or same streets within a dependent locality.

organisationName.description: The organisation name is the business name given to a delivery point within a building or small group of buildings. This field could also include entries for churches, public houses and libraries.

street.description: A road, track or named access route on which the address is located.

subBuildingName.description: The sub-building name and/or number are identifiers for subdivision of properties.
